card_text: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 non-Dragon "Vanquish Soul" monster you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects, by revealing monster(s) in your hand with the listed Attribute(s);$N●EARTH: This face-up card is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects this turn.$N●EARTH, FIRE, & DARK: Destroy 1 other card on the field.$NYou can only use each effect of "Vanquish Soul Caesar Valius" once per turn, and cannot activate more than 1 in the same Chain.
